input.sentences: i invited all of my friends to my house last week for a party .
they were very excited when they arrived .
a few of them decided to get a workout done while they were there .
afterwards we all went outside to take pictures in the courtyard .
output.sentences: This week there was a party and everyone was invited.
Martha was so excited to be invited.
Luckily, everything in the party worked out just right
The party-goers really liked having fun out on the courtyard.
